io.spine.server.commandbus

Class SingleCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandSequence<io.spine.core.EventId,R,B,S>
      • io.spine.server.commandbus.SingleCommand

  • @Internal
public class SingleCommand
extends CommandSequence<io.spine.core.EventId,R,B,S>
    A sequence with one command was generated in response to an incoming event.

    The result of the sequence is the system command for event lifecycle aggregate.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandSequence
